New Records: Isaiah Joe scored a career-high 31 points on 11-of-16 shooting and 8-of-11 from 3.
Isaiah Joe made a career-high 8 outside shots.
Key Match Events: The Oklahoma City Thunder collected a 126-101 win over the New York Knicks.
The Thunder have won seven games in a row at Madison Square Garden since 2017.
Pre-Game Insights: Thunder head coach Mark Daigneault said they were waiting for a game like this and that Joe's shooting was a matter of time.
Post-Match Reflections: Mark Daigneault was happy for Joe and said his performance was unbelievable.
Isaiah Joe said he believes in the law of averages and that he stays consistent with his work off the court.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander said Joe is too good of a shooter and that he will figure it out.
Jalen Williams said Joe puts in enough work in the summer to have games like this.
Others: The Thunder have won seven games in a row at MSG since 2017.
